steps.name: Given I have configured to operator to observe the Namespace 'entando-k8s-operator-common-cmpr60-test1'
And I have configured to operator to have interest in the Namespace 'entando-k8s-operator-common-cmpr60-test12'
And I have created a ProvidedCapability 'my-capability1' with the label 'my-label=value1' in the Namespace 'entando-k8s-operator-common-cmpr60-test1'
And I have created a ProvidedCapability 'my-capability2' with the label 'my-label=value2' in the Namespace 'entando-k8s-operator-common-cmpr60-test12'
And I have logged in with an account that has access to the namespaces entando-k8s-operator-common-cmpr60-test1 and
